LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_DESCRIPTION.message: Chromebook starts in seconds, so you can go straight to playing, enjoying or working (if you have to).

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION1_DESCR.message: Chromebook boots up in less than 10 seconds, and unlike other computers, doesn’t slow down over time.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SPEED_SECTION2_DESCR.message: With features like Chrome Instant built-in, browse the web at lightning speed.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_DESCRIPTION.message: Chromebook has apps built in, so it works right out of the box.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION1_DESCRI.message: Docs, Hangouts and Play Music come free with your Chromebook. Add new apps directly from the Chrome Web Store.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_APPS_SECTION2_DESCRI.message: Chromebook updates itself automatically so there’s no annoying pop-ups.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION.message: Virus protection is built in, and your files are safely backed up online.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION1_DE.message: Virus protection and other security features keep you safe from viruses, malware and other computer nasties.

LEARN_MORE_FEATURES_SECURITY_SECTION2_DE.message: With Google Drive, an online file storage service, you can backup your files and access them from anywhere.

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION.message: Chromebook helps you get stuff done even if you are not connected to the web.

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Apps like Google Docs, Offline Gmail, a media player and a photo editor keep you productive on the go.

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_TITLE.message: Get more in the Chrome Web Store

LEARN_MORE_OFFLINE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: You can find many more free offline apps in the Chrome Web Store.

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_DESCRIPTION.message: Your Chromebook can print wirelessly to any cloud-connected printer.

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Cloud Print runs over the web so your Chromebook can print whether you’re in the same room as your printer, or on the go.

LEARN_MORE_PRINTING_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: Cloud Ready printers work right out of the box, but if you own a PC or Mac and a conventional printer, you can connect it to work with your Chromebook.

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_DESCRIPTION.message: Send your favorite online entertainment from your Chromebook to your TV. For $35.

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION1_DESCRIPTION.message: Enjoy online movies, music, and more on your TV.

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION2_TITLE.message: Cast the web to your TV

LEARN_MORE_DO_MORE_SECTION2_DESCRIPTION.message: Cast a Chrome browser tab from your Chromebook to your TV at home (beta).
